item.title: Fastgas at roadside, 14th December
item.description:
Drivers are parking up in the dead space at the top of Pegwell Street and using nitrous oxide. The large fastgas tubes are left at the roadside. This needs to be addressed in partnership with Police. The litter is not moving, why are the streets not being cleaned?
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Alabama Street, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Small bonfire of rubbish outside 178 Rydal drive, 14th December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 182, Rydal Drive, Barnehurst, Greater London

item.title: Ongoing fly tipping problem, 14th December
item.description:
Once again this green bin is overflowing with flytipped waste and is blowing down Grove Lane. We have to sweep multiple times a day to deal with rubbish that isn’t ours - please come up with a permanent solution.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Cuthill Walk, Camberwell, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dulwich Village roundabout, 14th December
item.description:
Dangerous roundabout. Over the last year there have been multiple serious incidents where cyclists have been knocked off bikes. Injuries include an open tibial fracture and another with facial fractures requiring surgery. Children cycle around this roundabout daily and cars speed across it, The signage is inadequate on college and gallery road leading to drivers being confused and stopping suddenly. The end of Burbage road junction is also dangerous with traffic looking right and hitting cyclist to their left,
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gallery Road, Dulwich Village, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
